info.author: Nick Lewis thecanary@gmail.com
info.abstract: Four models that add time or memory strength to a logistic regression over the "error rate" learning curve data.
info.description: An extension of models such as AFM. Added factor of time inspired by cognitive models of memory. The LRT model simply adds time between opportunities as a factor. DASH models are taken from Michael Mozer and Robert Lindsey's work incorporating cognitive theories into big data approaches. There is an option to use the memory factor as either a fixed effect or as a random slope on items (KCs).
info.options:
KC Model - the column containing the Knowledge Component Model (KCM) data
Memory Model - Choose between the type of memory model that generates the memory factor
Factor Type - Choose between setting memory as a fixed effect or as a random slope on item (KC)
